resource.chars:
Pelvis continued 
Male Musk Sheep Sir J Richardson 
Female Musk Sheep Sir J Richardson 
Musk Sheep Coll. Surg 
Alderny Cow. 
Distance from the tuberosity of the ischium to the 
brim of the acetabulum nearest to it. 7.4 8.8 -- 8.5 
Distance from the atalantal brim of the acetablulum 
to the sternal corner of the iliac crest. 8.0 8.0 8.0 8.8 
Length of the proximal ramus of the pubal from 
the edge of the acetabulum to the symphysis 2.8 3.1 -- 3.5
